ieee8021DdcfmMIB.name: ieee8021DdcfmMIB

revisions.description: Published as part of IEEE Std 802.1Q 2014 revision. Cross references updated and corrected.
Minor edits to contact information etc. as part of 2011 revision of IEEE Std 802.1Q.
Included in IEEE802.1Qaw D5.0 Copyright (c) IEEE

ieee8021DdcfmMIB.contactinfo: WG-URL: http://grouper.ieee.org/groups/802/1/index.html WG-EMail: stds-802-1@ieee.org Contact: IEEE 802.1 Working Group Chair Postal: C/O IEEE 802.1 Working Group IEEE Standards Association 445 Hoes Lane P.O. Box 1331 Piscataway NJ 08855-1331 USA E-mail: STDS-802-1-L@LISTSERV.IEEE.ORG
ieee8021DdcfmMIB.description: module for managing Data Dependent and Data Driven Connectivity Fault Management. Unless otherwise indicated, the references in this MIB module are to IEEE Std 802.1Q-2014. Copyright (C) IEEE (2014). This version of this MIB module is part of IEEE Std 802.1Q; see the draft itself for full legal notices.

ieee8021DdcfmStackTable.name: ieee8021DdcfmStackTable
ieee8021DdcfmStackTable.description: The DDCFM Stack MIB object table. This table is for operator to retrieve all the DDCFM entities defined on a specified interface. This table is created by default.

ieee8021DdcfmStackIfIndex.name: ieee8021DdcfmStackIfIndex
ieee8021DdcfmStackIfIndex.description: This object is the interface index of the interface either a Bridge Port, or an aggregated port within a Bridge Port. When the ifIndex value corresponds to the ifIndex of a Bridge Port, the value in this column must match the value in the ieee8021BridgeBasePortIfIndex column for the Bridge Port.

ieee8021DdcfmStackRrMdLevel.name: ieee8021DdcfmStackRrMdLevel
ieee8021DdcfmStackRrMdLevel.description: MD level of the Reflection Responder managed object.

ieee8021DdcfmStackRrDirection.name: ieee8021DdcfmStackRrDirection
ieee8021DdcfmStackRrDirection.description: The direction in which the RR faces.

ieee8021DdcfmStackRFMreceiverMdLevel.name: ieee8021DdcfmStackRFMreceiverMdLevel
ieee8021DdcfmStackRFMreceiverMdLevel.description: MD level of the RFM Receiver MO configured on the interface.

ieee8021DdcfmStackDrMdLevel.name: ieee8021DdcfmStackDrMdLevel
ieee8021DdcfmStackDrMdLevel.description: MD level of the Deflection Responder managed object.

ieee8021DdcfmStackDrVlanIdOrNone.name: ieee8021DdcfmStackDrVlanIdOrNone
ieee8021DdcfmStackDrVlanIdOrNone.description: The MA of the DR configured on the interface.

ieee8021DdcfmStackSFMOriginatorMdLevel.name: ieee8021DdcfmStackSFMOriginatorMdLevel
ieee8021DdcfmStackSFMOriginatorMdLevel.description: MD level of the SFM Originator MO configured on the interface.

ieee8021DdcfmStackSFMOriginatorVlanIdOrN.name: ieee8021DdcfmStackSFMOriginatorVlanIdOrNone
ieee8021DdcfmStackSFMOriginatorVlanIdOrN.description: The MA of the SFM Originator configured on the interface.

ieee8021DdcfmStackSFMOriginatorDirection.name: ieee8021DdcfmStackSFMOriginatorDirection
ieee8021DdcfmStackSFMOriginatorDirection.description: The direction of which the SFM Originator is facing.

ieee8021DdcfmRrTable.name: ieee8021DdcfmRrTable
ieee8021DdcfmRrTable.description: The Reflection Responder MIB object table. Each row in the table represents a different Reflection Responder. All rows in this table persist across a system restart, however after such a restart, the value of the ActivationStatus column will be false.

ieee8021DdcfmRrEntry.name: ieee8021DdcfmRrEntry
ieee8021DdcfmRrEntry.description: The Reflection Responder. Each entry associated with a Reflection Responder.

ieee8021DdcfmRrIfIndex.name: ieee8021DdcfmRrIfIndex
ieee8021DdcfmRrIfIndex.description: This object is the interface index of the interface either a Bridge Port, or an aggregated port within a Bridge Port, on which Reflection Responder is defined. When the ifIndex value corresponds to the ifIndex of a Bridge Port, the value in this column must match the value in the ieee8021BridgeBasePortIfIndex column for the Bridge Port.

ieee8021DdcfmRrMdIndex.name: ieee8021DdcfmRrMdIndex
ieee8021DdcfmRrMdIndex.description: MD level of the Reflection Responder managed object.

ieee8021DdcfmRrDirection.name: ieee8021DdcfmRrDirection
ieee8021DdcfmRrDirection.description: The direction in which the RR faces.

ieee8021DdcfmRrPrimaryVlanIdOrNone.name: ieee8021DdcfmRrPrimaryVlanIdOrNone
ieee8021DdcfmRrPrimaryVlanIdOrNone.description: The VID to be used on RFM frames.

ieee8021DdcfmRrFilter.name: ieee8021DdcfmRrFilter
ieee8021DdcfmRrFilter.description: A pattern string specifies what data frames are selected to be reflected. Below are the primary Reflection Filters all Implementers should support. Multiple primary filters can be combined together by && (and), || (or), or !(negation). 1) All; 2) VID= vid; 3) I-SID = x; 4) DA = xx.xx.xx.xx.xx.xx; 5) SA = xx.xx.xx.xx.xx.xx; 6) EtherType =xx. For the reason that this management object allows a max size of 1500, messages carrying this object may be fragmented on some segments.

ieee8021DdcfmRrSamplingInterval.name: ieee8021DdcfmRrSamplingInterval
ieee8021DdcfmRrSamplingInterval.description: Indicates a time interval in which only the first frame matching the filter conditions is refected.

ieee8021DdcfmRrTargetAddress.name: ieee8021DdcfmRrTargetAddress
ieee8021DdcfmRrTargetAddress.description: The Reflection Target Address, which is a MAC address to which the reflected frames are targeted. Only individual address is allowed for the Reflection Target Address. If not specified, the source_address of the selected data frame is used for Reflection Target Address.

ieee8021DdcfmRrContinueFlag.name: ieee8021DdcfmRrContinueFlag
ieee8021DdcfmRrContinueFlag.description: True indicates that the selected data frames are to be continued towards the DA specified in the frame header. False indicates that the selected data frames are terminated.

ieee8021DdcfmRrDuration.name: ieee8021DdcfmRrDuration
ieee8021DdcfmRrDuration.description: Duration of time in the unit of seconds or the number of frames to be reflected, for Reflection Responder to remain active after activation; Minimum 2 octets (65536 seconds) are needed for the duration of time;

ieee8021DdcfmRrDurationInTimeFlag.name: ieee8021DdcfmRrDurationInTimeFlag
ieee8021DdcfmRrDurationInTimeFlag.description: True indicates that duration is in seconds; False indicates that duration is by the total number of frames reflected.

ieee8021DdcfmRrVlanPriority.name: ieee8021DdcfmRrVlanPriority
ieee8021DdcfmRrVlanPriority.description: Priority, 3 bit value to be used in the VLAN tag, to be used in the transmitted encapsulated frames. The default value is the highest priority.

ieee8021DdcfmRrVlanDropEligible.name: ieee8021DdcfmRrVlanDropEligible
ieee8021DdcfmRrVlanDropEligible.description: It indicates that drop_eligible bit value to be used in the VLAN tag which to be used in the transmitted encapsulated frames is set as True or False accordingly.

ieee8021DdcfmRrFloodingFlag.name: ieee8021DdcfmRrFloodingFlag
ieee8021DdcfmRrFloodingFlag.description: True indicates that flooding is allowed if Egress port cannot be identified for RFM by the Filtering Database, False otherwise.

ieee8021DdcfmRrTruncationFlag.name: ieee8021DdcfmRrTruncationFlag
ieee8021DdcfmRrTruncationFlag.description: True indicates that the received data frame will be truncated to keep the contructed RFM size not exceeding the egress port's Maximum Service Data Unit Size, False otherwise.

ieee8021DdcfmRrActivationStatus.name: ieee8021DdcfmRrActivationStatus
ieee8021DdcfmRrActivationStatus.description: True When receiving a request to activate a Reflection Responder, False When receiving a request to stop Reflection Responder or its timer expires.

ieee8021DdcfmRrRemainDuration.name: ieee8021DdcfmRrRemainDuration
ieee8021DdcfmRrRemainDuration.description: The value indicates the time, in the unit of seconds, or count left for Reflection Responder to be active.

ieee8021DdcfmRrNextRfmTransID.name: ieee8021DdcfmRrNextRfmTransID
ieee8021DdcfmRrNextRfmTransID.description: It indicates the value of RFM Transaction Identifier field of the next RFM transmitted. It is incremented by 1 with each transmission of RFM.

ieee8021DdcfmRrRowStatus.name: ieee8021DdcfmRrRowStatus
ieee8021DdcfmRrRowStatus.description: The status of the row. The writable columns in a row can not be changed if the row is active.

ieee8021DdcfmRFMReceiverTable.name: ieee8021DdcfmRFMReceiverTable
ieee8021DdcfmRFMReceiverTable.description: The RFM Receiver MIB object table. Each row in the table represents a different RFM Receiver. All rows associated with this table persist across system restart.

ieee8021DdcfmRFMReceiverEntry.name: ieee8021DdcfmRFMReceiverEntry
ieee8021DdcfmRFMReceiverEntry.description: The DDCFM RFM Receiver. Each entry associated with a DDCFM RFM Receiver that reference to a MP.

ieee8021DdcfmRfmReceiverIfIndex.name: ieee8021DdcfmRfmReceiverIfIndex
ieee8021DdcfmRfmReceiverIfIndex.description: The interface index of the interface either a Bridge Port, or an aggregated port within a Bridge Port, on which the RFM Receiver is created. When the ifIndex value corresponds to the ifIndex of a Bridge Port, the value in this column must match the value in the ieee8021BridgeBasePortIfIndex column for the Bridge Port.

ieee8021DdcfmRfmReceiverMdIndex.name: ieee8021DdcfmRfmReceiverMdIndex
ieee8021DdcfmRfmReceiverMdIndex.description: MD level of the RFM Receiver managed object.

ieee8021DdcfmRFMRowStatus.name: ieee8021DdcfmRFMRowStatus
ieee8021DdcfmRFMRowStatus.description: The status of the row. The writable columns in a row can not be changed if the row is active.

ieee8021DdcfmDrTable.name: ieee8021DdcfmDrTable
ieee8021DdcfmDrTable.description: The DDCFM Decapsulator Responder MIB object table. Each row in the table represents a different DDCFM Decapsulator Responder. All rows in this table persist across a system restart; however after such a restart, the value of the ActivationStatus column will be false.

ieee8021DdcfmDrEntry.name: ieee8021DdcfmDrEntry
ieee8021DdcfmDrEntry.description: The DDCFM Decapsulator Responder. Each entry associated with a DDCFM RFM Receiver which reference to a MP.

ieee8021DdcfmDrIfIndex.name: ieee8021DdcfmDrIfIndex
ieee8021DdcfmDrIfIndex.description: The interface index of the interface either a Bridge Port, or an aggregated port within a Bridge Port, on which the Decapsulator Responder is created. When the ifIndex value corresponds to the ifIndex of a Bridge Port, the value in this column must match the value in the ieee8021BridgeBasePortIfIndex column for the Bridge Port.

ieee8021DdcfmDrMdIndex.name: ieee8021DdcfmDrMdIndex
ieee8021DdcfmDrMdIndex.description: MD level of the Decapsulator Responder managed object.

ieee8021DdcfmDrVlanIdOrNone.name: ieee8021DdcfmDrVlanIdOrNone
ieee8021DdcfmDrVlanIdOrNone.description: An integer indicating the VID expected from the Send Frame Message frames.

ieee8021DdcfmDrSfmOriginator.name: ieee8021DdcfmDrSfmOriginator
ieee8021DdcfmDrSfmOriginator.description: MAC address reference to the corresponding Send Frame Message Originator.

ieee8021DdcfmDrSourceAddressStayFlag.name: ieee8021DdcfmDrSourceAddressStayFlag
ieee8021DdcfmDrSourceAddressStayFlag.description: True indicates that Decapsulator Responder does not replace the source_address field of the decapsulated frame with the Decapsulator Responder's own MAC address, False otherwise.

ieee8021DdcfmDrFloodingFlag.name: ieee8021DdcfmDrFloodingFlag
ieee8021DdcfmDrFloodingFlag.description: True indicates that broadcast is allowed if Egress port cannot be identified by the Filtering Database, False otherwise.

ieee8021DdcfmDrDuration.name: ieee8021DdcfmDrDuration
ieee8021DdcfmDrDuration.description: The time that the Decapsulator Responder can stay active after its activation in the unit of seconds.

ieee8021DdcfmDrActivationStatus.name: ieee8021DdcfmDrActivationStatus
ieee8021DdcfmDrActivationStatus.description: True When receiving a request to activate a Decapsulator Responder, false When receiving a request to stop the Decapsulator Responder or its timer expires.

ieee8021DdcfmDrRemainDuration.name: ieee8021DdcfmDrRemainDuration
ieee8021DdcfmDrRemainDuration.description: The value indicates the time left for Decapsulator Responder keep active. Its granularity is in seconds.

ieee8021DdcfmDrSFMsequenceErrors.name: ieee8021DdcfmDrSFMsequenceErrors
ieee8021DdcfmDrSFMsequenceErrors.description: The value indicates the total number of out-of-sequence SFMs.

ieee8021DdcfmDrRowStatus.name: ieee8021DdcfmDrRowStatus
ieee8021DdcfmDrRowStatus.description: The status of the row. The writable columns in a row can not be changed if the row is active.

ieee8021DdcfmSoTable.name: ieee8021DdcfmSoTable
ieee8021DdcfmSoTable.description: The DDCFM Send Frame Message Originator MIB object table. Each row in the table represents a different DDCFM Send Frame Message Originator. All rows in this table persist across a system restart; however after such a restart, the value of the ActivationStatus column will be false.

ieee8021DdcfmSoEntry.name: ieee8021DdcfmSoEntry
ieee8021DdcfmSoEntry.description: Each entry associated with a Send Frame Message Originator.

ieee8021DdcfmSfmIfIndex.name: ieee8021DdcfmSfmIfIndex
ieee8021DdcfmSfmIfIndex.description: The interface index of the interface either a Bridge port, or an aggregated port within a Bridge port, on which Send Frame Message Originator is created. When the ifIndex value corresponds to the ifIndex of a Bridge Port, the value in this column must match the value in the ieee8021BridgeBasePortIfIndex column for the Bridge Port.

ieee8021DdcfmSoMdIndex.name: ieee8021DdcfmSoMdIndex
ieee8021DdcfmSoMdIndex.description: MD level of the Send Frame Message Originator managed object.

ieee8021DdcfmSoVlanIdOrNone.name: ieee8021DdcfmSoVlanIdOrNone
ieee8021DdcfmSoVlanIdOrNone.description: An integer indicating the VID to be used on Send Frame Message frames.

ieee8021DdcfmSoDirection.name: ieee8021DdcfmSoDirection
ieee8021DdcfmSoDirection.description: The direction in which the SFM Originator faces.

ieee8021DdcfmSoDrMacAddress.name: ieee8021DdcfmSoDrMacAddress
ieee8021DdcfmSoDrMacAddress.description: MAC Address of the corresponding Decapsulator Responder.

ieee8021DdcfmSoDuration.name: ieee8021DdcfmSoDuration
ieee8021DdcfmSoDuration.description: Duration, in the unit of seconds, of Send Frame Message Originator staying active once activated.

ieee8021DdcfmSoActivationStatus.name: ieee8021DdcfmSoActivationStatus
ieee8021DdcfmSoActivationStatus.description: True When receiving a request to activate a Send Frame Message Originator, false When receiving a request to stop the Send Frame Message Originator or its timer expires.

ieee8021DdcfmSoRemainDuration.name: ieee8021DdcfmSoRemainDuration
ieee8021DdcfmSoRemainDuration.description: The value indicates the time left for Send Frame Message Originator keep active. Its granularity is in seconds.

ieee8021DdcfmSoRowStatus.name: ieee8021DdcfmSoRowStatus
ieee8021DdcfmSoRowStatus.description: The status of the row. The writable columns in a row can not be changed if the row is active.

ieee8021DdcfmStackGroup.name: ieee8021DdcfmStackGroup
ieee8021DdcfmStackGroup.description: Objects for the DDCFM Stack group.

ieee8021DdcfmRrGroup.name: ieee8021DdcfmRrGroup
ieee8021DdcfmRrGroup.description: Objects for the Reflection Responder group.

ieee8021DdcfmRFMReceiverGroup.name: ieee8021DdcfmRFMReceiverGroup
ieee8021DdcfmRFMReceiverGroup.description: Objects for the RFM Receiver group.

ieee8021DdcfmDrGroup.name: ieee8021DdcfmDrGroup
ieee8021DdcfmDrGroup.description: Objects for the Decapsulator Responder group.

ieee8021DdcfmSoGroup.name: ieee8021DdcfmSoGroup
ieee8021DdcfmSoGroup.description: Objects for the Send Frame Message Originator group.

ieee8021DdcfmCompliance.name: ieee8021DdcfmCompliance
ieee8021DdcfmCompliance.description: The compliance statement for support of the DDCFM MIB module.
